about_the_game:
FrogeOn takes you into a unique and challenging digital world. A young frog named Froge has been sucked into a defective video game where viruses threaten the system, and chaos reigns across the circuits. The only way out is to reach the motherboard's core, but the path is filled with dangers, puzzles, and electrifying enemies.

Game Features:

  • Pixel Art Style: Vibrant and detailed visuals bring the digital world to life.

  • Varied and fun gameplay: Combine tongue attacks, projectiles, and unique abilities to overcome challenges.

  • Metroidvania exploration: Interconnected areas filled with secrets and unlockable paths.

  • Electrifying enemies: Face creatures like the Tesla Crab and discover unique attack patterns.

  • Upgrade system: Ability chips, such as virus resistance and explosive balloons, add depth to the gameplay.

  • Intuitive minimap and inventory: Navigate seamlessly while managing pendrives and abilities.

  • Engaging story: Help Froge escape this broken video game and save the system!

FrogeOn blends the nostalgia of classic platformers with modern, dynamic gameplay. Whether you're a casual player or a hardcore metroidvania fan, this journey is not to be missed.

name: FrogeON

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: FrogeON is a Mini-Metroidvania pixel art game where you control Froge, a frog trapped in a video game. Use your tongue to attack, explore interconnected areas, and unlock unique abilities as you face electrifying enemies and uncover secrets in a digital world full of challenges.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
